markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Duskwalker](/Traits.aspx?ID=751)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 316 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait has the [duskwalker](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=87) [versatile heritage](/Rules.aspx?ID=2085). Duskwalkers are [planar scions](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=456) infused with the supernatural energy of [psychopomps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=458).
name: Duskwalker
